list.title: Left - Title and Index
list.introduction: Left section contains the title, subtitle and index list of all the sections' name. When click on the index, the right page scrolling down to the certain section.

list.title: Right - Section List
list.introduction: On the right are the introduction of this project and a list of all sections. Each section contains brief introductions and image thumbnails of this section's design and implementation work. Design / implementation title, image thumbnails and "more..." are clickable and link to section's detail page.
